events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our technology team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department focusing on software development roles.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will be your point of contact throughout the hiring process.
We completed an initial screening call discussing your experience and verifying key qualifications relevant to our software engineering team.
Thank you for responding promptly to the screening and confirming your availability for next stage interviews.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 10th, where you will discuss software design and coding challenges.
